title: What is Greg and Colin's Nashville Livestream?
description:
Nashville is wrapping up its first season Wednesday, May 22nd. To celebrate, Greg and Colin are livestreaming their reactions to the hit ABC show and creating one place for every Nashville fan to come and discuss the episode and the season.: http://www.youtube.com/user/GameOverGreggy/featured?v=XNMEYvN8T7g

Catch up on Nashville before the finale: http://itunes.apple.com/us/tv-season/nashville-season-1/id550311456

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Follow Colin on Twitter: http://twitter.com/notaxation
Follow Nashville on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Nashville_ABC

Get the Nashville soundtrack on iTunes: http://itunes.apple.com/us/artist/nashville-cast/id576010239
